dischargeDispositionCode.displayName: Discharged to Home or Self Care (Routine Discharge)

tr.td: The patient was admitted for complications arising from Diabetes. During the course of stabilization and care, it was determined that a root cause of her continued diabetic complications was the inability to afford and get access to healthy food. Nutrition education sessions were provided and a referral to Senior Farmers' Market Nutrition Program was made. This program is convenient to her and will provide additional health food access as well as social supports, companionship and nutrition education.
Nutrition impaired due to limited access to healthful foods

value.displayName: Nutrition impaired due to limited access to healthful foods (finding)

translation.displayName: Other specified lack of adequate food

code.displayName: (I/We) worried whether (my/our) food would run out before (I/we) got money to buy more
Within the past 12Mo the food we bought just didn't last and we didn't have money to get more
